response.summary: I am a full time Software Engineer at Bold and also a college student in the Universidad Nacional de Colombia. My career path have covered knowlege about conectivity and comunity power, about Software Engineering, development and about Software Architechture. I am particulary interested in the interoperability attribute quiality. My plans are to show how a distribuited comunity system works better than individuals, like us, human beings.
response.skills: Amazon Web Services (AWS), Git, Docker, Python (Programming Language), Linux, Python, Object-Oriented Programming (OOP), Software Architecture, Clean Code, Agile Methodologies, Algorithms, Node.js, Java, MySQL, JSON, PostgreSQL, SQL, Machine Learning

profile_positions.description: Being Software Engineer at Bold is about designing, planning and building high quality software related with financial tecnologies.
profile_positions.title: Senior Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
As Junior Software Engineer at PayU, I was responsable of delivering quality software to achieve different goals related to the PayU’s platform, and be active and participant part in all the software development phases.
Some examples of my wor:
- Building some payment network integrations and orchestation
- Adding unit, integration, component and end to end automated tests
- Researching new software technologies and software architectures
profile_positions.title: Junior Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
As Junior Engineer at Xphera Group I was responsible of adding new features and functionality to client Odoo ERP solution. To getting user histories and implementing them as Odoo Modules and intergations.
An example of my work here was integarting a new electronic facturation module consuming the FacturaTech API, an electronic facturation server provider that follows the Dian regulations, the Colombian taxes entity
profile_positions.title: Junior Engineer

profile_positions.description: As consultant at Xphera Group, I was responsible for acquiring new techniques and knowledge about Odoo ERP and integrate some examples projects.
profile_positions.title: Consultant

profile_positions.description:
In the Universidad Nacional de Colombia as Junior Python Engineer I could learn a lot of techniques to build several services for the academic affairs of the Faculty of Engineering.
I could use some technologies such as non relational databases, authentication mechanisms and cloud based architechtures.
profile_positions.title: Junior Python Developer
